quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
together: "Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive." --Elbert Hubbard

quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
together: "I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member." --Groucho Marx

quote: I am not a member of any organized political party. I am a Democrat.
together: "I am not a member of any organized political party. I am a Democrat." --Will Rogers

quote: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
together: "Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese." --Luis Bunuel

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
together: "Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes." --Jim Carrey

quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
together: "Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone." --Anthony Burgess

quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
together: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." --Steve Martin

quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
together: "I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific." --Lily Tomlin

quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
together: "Only the mediocre are always at their best." --Jean Giraudoux

quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is.
together: "My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is." --Ellen DeGeneres

quote: What's another word for Thesaurus?
together: "What's another word for Thesaurus?" --Steven Wright

quote: Progress is man's ability to complicate simplicity.
together: "Progress is man's ability to complicate simplicity." --Thor Heyerdahl

quote: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
together: "If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner." --Tallulah Bankhead

quote: You're only as good as your last haircut.
together: "You're only as good as your last haircut." --Fran Lebowitz

quote: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
together: "It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper." --Jerry Seinfeld

quote: My life needs editing.
together: "My life needs editing." --Mort Sahl

quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die.
together: "Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die." --Mel Brooks

quote: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
together: "By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out." --Richard Dawkins

quote: If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
together: "If you don't mind, it doesn't matter." --Jack Benny

quote: I am a marvelous housekeeper. Every time I leave a man I keep his house.
together: "I am a marvelous housekeeper. Every time I leave a man I keep his house." --Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
together: "Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid." --Hedy Lamarr

quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
together: "I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by." --Douglas Adams

quote: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full.
together: "There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full." --Henry Kissinger

quote: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know.
together: "We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know." --W. H. Auden

quote: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
together: "Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life." --Brooke Shields

quote: Everything I like is either illegal, immoral or fattening.
together: "Everything I like is either illegal, immoral or fattening." --Alexander Woollcott

quote: I love mankind; it's people I can't stand.
together: "I love mankind; it's people I can't stand." --Charles M. Schulz

quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
together: "Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else." --Margaret Mead

quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
together: "As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it." --Buddy Hackett

quote: All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height.
together: "All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height." --Casey Stengel

quote: My definition of an intellectual is someone who can listen to the William Tell Overture without thinking of the Lone Ranger.
together: "My definition of an intellectual is someone who can listen to the William Tell Overture without thinking of the Lone Ranger." --Billy Connolly

quote: Expert: a man who makes three correct guesses consecutively.
together: "Expert: a man who makes three correct guesses consecutively." --Laurence J. Peter

quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
together: "It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance." --Thomas Sowell

quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
together: "I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food." --W. C. Fields

quote: Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely.
together: "Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely." --P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
together: "I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party." --Ron White

quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
together: "No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar." --Abraham Lincoln

quote: Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.
together: "Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before." --Mae West

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
together: "Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city." --George Burns

quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
together: "I can resist everything except temptation." --Oscar Wilde

quote: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
together: "Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race." --H. G. Wells

quote: If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster.
together: "If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster." --Clint Eastwood

quote: Working with Julie Andrews is like getting hit over the head with a valentine.
together: "Working with Julie Andrews is like getting hit over the head with a valentine." --Christopher Plummer

quote: Never put a sock in a toaster.
together: "Never put a sock in a toaster." --Eddie Izzard

quote: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning.
together: "They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning." --Clint Eastwood

quote: I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw that my bath toys were a toaster and a radio.
together: "I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw that my bath toys were a toaster and a radio." --Joan Rivers

quote: An optimist is a fellow who believes a housefly is looking for a way to get out.
together: "An optimist is a fellow who believes a housefly is looking for a way to get out." --George Jean Nathan

quote: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
together: "Life is hard. After all, it kills you." --Katharine Hepburn

quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
together: "Never have more children than you have car windows." --Erma Bombeck

quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
together: "There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments." --Chris Rock

quote: My theory is that all of Scottish cuisine is based on a dare.
together: "My theory is that all of Scottish cuisine is based on a dare." --Mike Myers

quote: All my life, I always wanted to be somebody. Now I see that I should have been more specific.
together: "All my life, I always wanted to be somebody. Now I see that I should have been more specific." --Jane Wagner

quote: Do not let a flattering woman coax and wheedle you and deceive you; she is after your barn.
together: "Do not let a flattering woman coax and wheedle you and deceive you; she is after your barn." --Hesiod

quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
together: "Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please." --Mark Twain

quote: He looked about as inconspicuous as a tarantula on a slice of angel food.
together: "He looked about as inconspicuous as a tarantula on a slice of angel food." --Raymond Chandler

quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them.
together: "I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them." --Phyllis Diller

quote: If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days.
together: "If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days." --Robin Williams

quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
together: "People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do." --Isaac Asimov

quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
together: "A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man." --Lana Turner

quote: A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul.
together: "A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul." --George Bernard Shaw
